support-hed: CAN WE COUNT ON YOUR SUPPORT?
support-text: Huge stories will shape Pennsylvania’s future next year, and now is the time to make an end-of-year investment in Spotlight PA’s unique, independent investigative reporting. Our work cannot continue into 2023 and beyond without your support.. This week only, all new monthly gifts will be matched at 12X their value. That means a $15/month gift will unlock a $180 bonus! Unlike many others, Spotlight PA has no shareholders, no billionaire owner, no pressure to turn a big profit. Just the determination and passion to deliver high-impact investigative and public-service reporting for Pennsylvania, always free from commercial or political influence. We provide our journalism for free, for everyone to read, because we believe in information equality. Greater numbers of people can keep track of the issues and events shaping our state, understand their impact on people and communities, and become inspired to take meaningful action. Millions can benefit from open access to quality, truthful news, regardless of their ability to pay for it. Every contribution, however big or small, powers our journalism in tight economic times and sustains our future. As you consider your end-of-year giving, please support Spotlight PA by making a tax-deductible gift today. And don't forget: All new monthly gifts made this week will be matched 12X as part of one of our biggest matching offers of the year! Lock in your bonus now. Can we count on your support of this important work?
topper-image-description: Help raise $125,000 in support of Spotlight PA's vital investigative journalism for Pennsylvania as part of our end-of-year fundraising campaign.
